content.detailedDescription:
Yesterday a buddy of mine(co-worker) came into work exclaiming he had to show me this photo he shot the previous saturday. on the above stated date, he was out on the coast near point reyes, ca with some of his friends. he had his digital camera with him and had been taking scenery pics(mountains, ocean, etc.) at exactly 12:09pm (as recorded by his camera) he took a shot of the sky as he thought the clouds would make a nice picture. he did not see anything with his eyes, but after he took the pic he noticed an object in the photo. it was oval/egg shaped and was white-ish in color. it had a "tail" behind it that was the same color. the oddest thing about this pic was that there were what appeared to be concentric circles, barely visible, that were the same white-ish color. they appear behind the object as if the object fell through the circles. on the furthest edges of the circles from the object there is another "tail" which lines up almost exactly with the tail just behind the object. this completely amazed me!! i've seen pictures and video clips on the internet and tv before of ufos but never from someone i knew. i downloaded this image directly from his camera to my desktop. i believe there is almost no way he could have photo-shopped this and then transfered it back to the memory card in his camera. it is not in his character to do something like that. he is not a ufo fanatic of any sorts and i just cannot see him fabricating a hoax like this. i honestly believe with all of my heart that this is genuine and it excites me very much!!! that being said, i guess there is still a possibility that this is merely a piece of an asteroid or sattellite falling to the earth. but the fact that he did not see this with his eyes, and the circles that appeared, just amazes me!! i will attach the picture. please tell me what you guys think of it. 

by the way, the first time i wrote this(earlier this evening), for the time of event i selected "hour 24"(12pm), and after i clicked submit i got an error message saying there was a problem with the hour i picked. i lost the whole message i'd written which which was kind of a bummer because it was so well versed with much enthusiasm and it took me a while to write it. it was hard to muster-up the gumption to do it again. maybe you guys can look into that. the drop-down menu for time seems to be out of order....Last i checked 12pm came after 11am. in your menu 11am is followed by 12am which does not make any sense.

anyways, thanks for taking the time to look at this. i'm sure you are constantly inundated with many, many photos and claims. also thanks for any response you can provide.

sincerely,
joshua s
content.summary: Not seen with eyes but captured in photo.

content.detailedDescription:
I was delivering a pizza off palm city rd. heading south and i noticed a object around 500 ft up hovering and not moving what so ever and i stoped my car and got out to check it out and as i was staring at this object two balls of lights shot out two sides and the craft and went in different directions. the triangle object soon started heading north and then started blinking blue and flew off at a medium speed, not too fast.  





around a year before this my friends family was in there front yard having a party around 9:00 pm and they all noticed 5 bright white lights really high up shaped like a five point star. as they watched this for about a hour the lights slowly got closer together and eventuallys they started spinning around really fast, came together, and shot out in all different directions.
content.summary: Three bright orange lights in shape of triangle.

content.detailedDescription: This picture was taken on the sky walk of the pier mall connecting to caesars casino around 5:30pm et on january 21st 2008.  we didn't notice the object when we first took the pictures. the pictures uploaded are the original pictures that were taken from my girlfriends 8mp digital camera. i also took a picture with my camera phone. both pictures were taken within 2 minutes of each other and the object is still in the same spot. the object isn't as clear on my camera phone but you can still faintly see it. i have also added a photo of the object zoomed in 200%. i am not saying that it is an alien craft but it is pretty unusual. i have showed all of these pictures to some friends of mine who are familiar with different commercial and military aircraft and stated that it doesn't resemble anything that they are familiar with but it also isn't clear enough to make a actual conclusion of what it is. what do you think it could be?
content.summary: Possible ufo in atlantic city.

content.detailedDescription: It was dust and i was looking out the sliding glass door at the sun set.  it was almost dark when i looked to my left and saw that a craft had landed about 20 or so yards away.  the occupents  had come out and were scooping up dirt and putting it in containers.  i must have looked afraid when i heard in my head as one of them looked up say to me, do not be afraid, we hare just collecting soil samples.  i remember replying back, ok.  the aliens looked very much like other peoples sightings, they were small, gray, had long arms and big dark tear drop shaped eyes.  then i remember taking a mental picture of my surroundings, almost like i was filming.  i first looked to my left and remember seeing the clock up above the stove in the kitchen and noticed the position of the hands. then looked at the sliding glass door and noticed it faced looking toward the west then at my right where my mother lay asleep on a chouch which also faced west.  there was a table next to the couch that was on.  behind me was the front door which faced east.  my father, brother and sister were not home.  when i looked out the sliding glass door again the craft took off.  i did not say anything to my family nor to anyone.  a couple of years later i was watching a news cast about ufo sightings and remember thinking to my self. "so that's what i saw when we were living at the edgemere apartments".  i still said nothing for over 40 years because i did not think i would be believed.  now that so many people have come forward i am hoping my story will be looked into further. but it is still vivid in my mind and know it to be an actuall sighting because i was only four years old at the time and know that at four years of age i did not know how to tell time nor direction until i was taught.  my story can be varified.  the street name and the apartments are still there.
content.summary: A sighting of a space craft and it's occupants.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home on a residential street in a suburban neighborhood. my 16-year old daughter was in the car with me. she noticed a bright light in the sky ahead of us and asked if it was the north star. i looked for a few moments, then told her that no star was that bright. i then racked my brain to see if any planets were visible this time of year. the light was approximately 250-300 feet above ground. as we neared closer, we could see that rather than one bright light, it was actually two white lights and two red lights that were blinking intermittently. 
i said to her, "must be an airplane."
as we neared even closer, i wondered out loud to her, "but airplanes don't hover."
the lights were remaining still in one spot directly in front of us. we could see, too, as we neared, that the lights were lower than first appeared, or perhaps had moved closer to the ground. the lights were not moving at all, other than blinking. it seemed odd and also apparent to me, that at my snail pace of 30mph, i was actually "catching up" with whatever it was. 
i told my daughter that we would find out what it was in a few seconds, because we're going to pass right under it. the object was still hovering in one spot.
what happened next is unimaginable and outlandish. we passed under the object, which took 2-3 seconds at my drive of 30mph. as we passed underneath, we could see that the object was triangular with round corners, the body was metallic, and corner of the triangle had a brightly colored light. one light was green. one light was red. i believe, but can't be positive, that the third light was white. directly connecting the large corner lights were smaller red and white lights that blinked in a row. the front of the triangle (the longer side) had an amazing glow from it, as if from interior lights. we passed under in absolute shock.
as we passed it, we both turned to each other and shouted.
"that was a ufo!" my daughter said.
i quickly pulled into a side street and turned my car around, in an attempt to catch back up to the object. by the time i had pulled in, backed up and turned around the object was almost gone from sight. it was now moving at a ridiculous speed away from us. i sped up, but within seconds the lights were completely gone from sight.
had my daughter not been in the car with me and witnessed what i had seen, i would have thought i had lost my mind.
content.summary: Triangle in sky hovered, moved overhead then disappeared from sight.

content.detailedDescription:
3 firery rings in a triangle descended to the treeline from nowhere, shot quickly across them and suddenly dropped in to the trees.  it moved in l shaped movements.

this was near fort custer military reserve.  it moved unlike any aircraft i had seen before.  i thought it might be a "harrier" or an experimental craft.  it looked a lot like the depiction in the belgian sightings, that is why i bothered let you know.  this was a long time ago, so i might have the year wrong, but i remember it was really late, and in the late fall.

i was riding in the back seat of my friend's car on the 94 freeway.

it appeared right in my line of sight over the tree line; it was bright.

i thought it was a ufo, but figured out over time it could have been a "harrier" jet.

it was 3 firery rings and moved with more "snap" than a chopper.  very fast, and it moved in l-shaped movements.

i asked my friend if she saw it, and she said no.

it fell under the tree line when i lost sight of it. (it must have landed)
content.summary: 3 firery rings in a triangle descended to the treeline from nowhere, shot quickly across them and suddenly dropped in to the trees.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband went out on our back deck at 8:00 pm last night, december 3rd, 2008, then he came rushing in the house telling me to come outside because he spotted a ufo. he said when he first saw it he thought it was a star but then it moved about the sky. i went out with him at about 8:04pm and he pointed to an object in the western sky that appeared to be a very bright white large star but then it started moving. it was too far away, west of banks towards the coastal range, to distinquish a shape. we live in rural banks, oregon 25 miles west of portland.We both watched this thing for quite sometime as it moved horizontally to the left then the right, straight up and down then zig zag patterns. it appeared at times to move our direction then it would move left and right and in different patterns of movement. 
at one point as we watched we saw a bright white flash to the right of the original thing at about a 45 degree angle lower in the sky. then another bright flash to the left of the thing. about the time we saw a the first flash below and to the right of the original object we also saw what we thought was a plane moving from a n direction to the south. during our observation you could hear many dogs in the general area barking. we watched this for about an hour then came inside.
i remember thinking,what is it doing and if we can see it, can it see us.
we had seen a similar object from our front deck towards the eastern sky about 7 years ago.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Appeared like a very large bright white star.

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping with my window open, i heard a double boom and bright light which woke me up.  sitting in bed i looked out on the ocean and saw two large glowing underwater lights about a half mile off shore.  my bedroom is a ~140 ft above sea level.  two bright blue-white glowing dots 100 yards/meters apart and 75 yards/meters appeared to be illuminating the surface from underwater.  i did not see or hear anything in the sky.  the large glowing dots underwater sat still for nearly 10 minutes and then headed due east at more than 100 knots (or more) off into the distance/infinity.  i only saw the two large glowing dots on the calm water.  the dots looked like the illumination point was underwater?   5 minute later i saw two fishing boats crossing the same are and based on realitive size of boat to underwater illuminated dots.  the surface was calm the object was deep enough to not disturb the water surface when moving.  please e-mail me if other people saw it.  no video but will put my video camera by the window if it happens again.
content.summary: Loud boom followed by two glowing lights under water half mile off shore

content.detailedDescription: My husband seen it last night he was driving to his store on washington ave in belleville nj when a very large shiny object cought his eye he looked at it for a minut or two and went inside the store to update his computer for the next day when he came out it was still there not moving and no sound.So he seat in his car for a minut and whatched it as it slowly started moving west.At this point he lost sight of it because of buildings and trees.My husband never beleived in ufos and makes fun of me for beleiving.I was just whatching ufo hunters last night.So he comes home a little before 3 am and wakes me up.His words wer honey if u seen it u would have bin going nuts.I said why what happend he said i just saw something in the sky it was very large and it was all lit up.So i nade him describe the shape of it.Was it round,was it square he said no it kind of looked like an apartment building.It went up and down.Didnt have straight sides.Now newark airport is right there i mean from belleville its only about 10 15 minuts away.If anything they should know something about it.
content.summary: Very large object all lit up.

content.detailedDescription:
Bright strobe star like object. with motion, flashing red, blue ,white, yellow light. appeared next day apx same time and location. 

appearance: apx. 9 pm pst. appears at apx. s.S.E about 75 degrees off horizon, brightest object in area. unlike stars, lights strobe with color distinct color changes. color is intense, red, blue, yellow and white blue light.  light intensity did not change over time. apx 1 1/2 hour of observation.
note: appeared the next night at about the same time in the same place in sky. did not observe on 3rd night.

has movement: it was the slow movement and the bright flashing that attracted my attention, first seen while casually looking out a window while watching a 52 inch tv on the same wall as window. despite the tv and a lighted room, this object movement, light intensity and color strobe effect caught my attention through the corner of my eye, as seen first looking out through the window.

at first, the object moved slowly in a straight westward arch only a several degrees, that is what first caught my attention, then the oddly strobing of colored lights. i used a fixed position of window frame to confirm this more rapid movement.  then after about 5 minutes became "fixed" in the sky, remained stationary, and tracked westward with other star movement over next hour  and a half or more.  

i went outside on deck next to window facing the object, assumed it was a large aircraft with unusual colors, but when it didn't approach or move away, i knew that this was now an object i could not identify. 

i called to my girl friend who came out and she too could see and describe the same object as i saw it.

observer: i have good eyes, recently checked. i use to be a pilot and owner of a private aircraft. i am an professional artist, and have painted airplanes, and so i do look at flying aircraft often. i like to look at the stars in this area of the sky often, once or twice a week min. never seen this one before.  note: i do not drink or use drugs, never have, so there are no metabolic effect or distortions.

condition of night sky: no clouds, clear. more stars visible than usual.  typical light atmospheric effects on all stars, with irregular same and near same color distortions. all stars in area where not blinking these unusual colors, or in set patterns as subject object, i believe this would rule out atmospheric effects.

i noticed other reports of same and similar objects, at different dates and times, mostly this year. why i am reporting this is because of a similar report in au, which is in the southern hemisphere!
the southern hemisphere views different stars and castellations as seen from the northern hemisphere.

question to be answered:

who else noticed this? 
why are there viewers of same or similar objects in the southern hemisphere?
could this be the space station or other man made space objects?
does the space station use colored lights?
where would i go, or who could find out sky orientation to confirm or rule our man made objects?

thank you for your time and attention,

the viewers.
content.summary: Bright strobe star like object. flashing red, blue, white, yellow light. appeared next day apx. same time and location.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out in the garden checking out the icy grass and looked up at the sky to see if it cloudy... suddenly, they was a green light in the sky travel at a very high speed and disappeared in few more seconds, and i am very much sure it was not one of the usual things we might notice in the sky.

and i was telling this incident to a colleague at work. to a surprise, three other collegues have noticed/heard about this incident.

i was left in shock having seen all the alien movies, etc...
content.summary: Ufo spotted over cambridge, uk.

content.detailedDescription:
It was saturday night and i was headed to oregon and i was rideing my motorcycle. i was headed up interstate 5 going north and i was aproximently 8 miles south of weed calif. the aproximent time was 1130 pm.
i am cruseing 65 miles per hour and i am all alone, and i look to my left to see a greenish ball with a red tail of fire comeing in at what looked like a slight angle it looked to be at about 3000 ft high  and it looked to be as big as two  747s. at first i thought it was a comet but it was comeing in to slow and i remember thinking to myself when that thing crashes i might be to close. but then it seemed to slow even more and go behind the mountain as if it was being controled. i waited to see if there was a crash but there never was. the entire event took 30 seconds
but it was amazeing and i shall never forget it as long as i live. 
i read that there is a base inside mount shasta and that sighting confirms it for me.
                          
                                          sincerely david ericson
content.summary: Ufo comes in from the west flies behind mount shasta.

content.detailedDescription:
I climb trees for a living. a few years back i worked with a crew of 4 other men on the border of canada and montana clearing trees on federal property. we spent a few nights that summer in a little town called malta, mt camping behind a little motel next to a bridge and a railroad track. one night after dinner on the campfire, andrew, a co-worker and somebody you could trust your first born with,  and i stayed up awhile chatting about work and various other things. i layed down on old picnic table bench staring up at the endless sky, while andrew paced about doing the same, when suddenly he stopped talking and asked me if that was a flock of ducks. baffled, i rose up and could see around the tree in the direction he was looking only to see a very bright white diamond shaped light, hovering about 2,000 feet. his comment about ducks seemed very strange to me when i first focused in on it, because it was very obviously not ducks. then he said, "i don't think that's man-made". we watched this thing silently hover, motionless in the night sky. i could see the difference in distances between the stars, the ground, and this extremely bright light only lit itself, nothing below or around it lit up. we both commented again on how we have no idea what that is. and just like that*snaps fingers*, the thing beamed across the sky like a laser in a westernly direction. gone in an instant flash. 
we stood there dumbfounded for a few minutes, mulled over a few possibilities, then oddly decided it was time for sleep. 
later that night at about 4a.M. both of us woke up from very disturbing dreams in the camper in a cold sweat at the same exact time. we never did discuss what we had dreamt about, but it is almost like we never need to, because we already know. 
andrew is 10 years older than me, he has a family, and was raised in the mormon church his entire life. i highly respected him as a co-worker and as a friend. and after that light disappeared streaking across the sky without a sound, it shook the inner core of his belief system. i have not spoken with him in a few years, but he would be willing to collaborate more to this story. 
the event was the first of several ufo sightings in my life, and i hope to have many more.
content.summary: Diamond shaped light hovering motionless and silent for several minutes before streaking across sky.

content.detailedDescription: Had come home from work about 8 pm.. working in the horse barn... finishing up the chores, now about 9 or 10pm... walked around the east end of the barn, looked into the north sky and saw three white lights- actually looked just like three bright stars in a triangle- but i had never seen three bright stars in a triangle shape in that part of the sky before.. as i reached for my binoculars (which i was carrying due to the prior months odd sighting)then looked up i saw the two lower-outermost stars just zip into the top bright star or light... and then there was just one bright star/light left in the sky at that spot.  i was too frightened to hang around and watch it. finished my chores and went inside.
content.summary: Three bright white lights in triangular shape, suddenly the two outermost zipped into the top one

content.detailedDescription: I had come home from work 8pm and had been feeding my horses at the barn, went into the house, as i came back out of the house to go back to the barn a very bright light towards the south caught my eye- it was about the height planes fly but was much bigger and was moving slowly, lights not at all like a plane... i ran in the house to get binoculars--- as i focused it looked triangular, large, lights going around it red-green or blue- yellow.. it went straight up, then down and gradually further and further away--- as it vanished into the distance it appeared more oval shaped with the lights pulsating around the outside- very bright... there was no noise at all. i felt frightened because it really was not like anything i had ever ever seen before, and it just did not seem normal. i tried to justify what it was and could only think it was a satelite being repositioned or something...I have no idea what a satelite looks like....But the way the lights rotated around it, and seemed to pulsate, it just seemed to be not man made.  i watched it for about 20minutes as it got smaller and smaller heading west.   about a month later another incident happened which i will submit another report about.  i have since moved my bed away from my north facing windows, and get kinda frightened being outside at night. i am outside a lot since i have horses etc. there really is something unusual out there. maybe i live too close to area 54 (or whatever its called in nevada...)... i had not really been a true believer in ufo's until these two happenings...
content.summary: Bright, pulsating lights circling around craft - red, blue, green, yellow

content.detailedDescription: I was out walking my dog and i noticed what looked like horizonal fireworks in the sky. it lasted for about 10 seconds... about 30 seconds later it happened again for about 10 seconds... i ran inside to get my video camera and i caught just an orange dot by time it was over.
content.summary: Looked like horizonal fireworks.

content.detailedDescription:
So just about 30 mins ago me and my father were standing outside talking  when a blue ball of light flew across the sky way slower than something burning  up like a meteor  this was far  brighter than a star. cobalt in color, slowly dimmed to were you could barley see it then streaked across the sky with a wierd blue streak.

this is the second ufo encounter i have had the last one was the day after halloween .
content.summary: Black triangle about 100 yards long with 3 blue lights at the tips second time ive seen this craft last time it had red lights.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving home from church coming n.E. on lawrenceville hwy. we saw a bright "star" off in the distance, right at the merge of scott blvd. and church street. when continuing  the object became brighter and brighter. we came just below the object at the intersection of lawrenceville hwy. and n. druid hills rd. i looked out the passengers window and looked up at it. the object was a triangular object with a bright white light on the bottom and two dull flashing green lights on the sides. i was looking at it and then i lost sight of the object for approx. 2-3 seconds and then it was gone just as a airplane flew over head. there is a public airport somewhat near by but the main object i saw was not a plane or a helicopter because there was no sound at all.
content.summary: Triangular object with two flashing green lights hovering.

content.detailedDescription:
while enjoying a nice sunny day in denver, 12/2/08, and as a 76 year old photo hobbyist who for ten years was a navy photographer i photographed a pulsed contrail above south denver's washington park lake. almost always carry a camera with me for an event like this. just above, and to the right, of the pulsed contrail i saw a small object making strange, rapid, unbelievable maneuvers.  it moved very fast and turned extremely fast,changing it's perspective, then it disappeared behind the clouds or i would have taken a picture of it also... not a bird, nor a plane could maneuver like it did. 
   while i was pointing my camera at the sky none of the joggers running by me along the side of lake looked up, or asked me what i was taking a picture of...
content.summary: Pulsed contrail & unidentified object.

content.detailedDescription: I want to be respected and protected and compensated i know what i have is worth its priceless through growing up just possessing what i have and becoming has been threatn9ng and deframental to my life i had endure though i dont want you to mistake the glory of it i ahve to get over to your understanding kinda having it in your black and white and trying to bring my color into the picture my knowing and my respect not to fool you
content.summary: The wheather was clear sunny overcast and partly cloudly it was a exciting day for a supernatural event

content.detailedDescription: Ok well it started when i was outside and i was having a pary for my mom and i was helping my cousin tell the cars to park somewhere else and then suddenly we saw an obgect come out of nowhere and just was floating but flying in the air. it had two lights in the front middle and back. it was a very scary event because it didn't make a noise and we have never seen an obgect like this before. it looked hexagonal but half of it was covered with this fog or smoke. it was flying over the tree line of my front lawn and then about five minutes later it went or flew south towards the highway and looked like a star blinking very brightly. it was very slow at first but when it moved far down it went faster than anything i have ever seen with my eyes. it looked like a bolt of lighting when it left or took off. my grandmom,cousin,and a friend saw it also. i tried to take a picture of it and when i put my cellphone up to the sky it was just stars and black. after seeing this object we were very scared but interested in learning more.
content.summary: It was hexagonal and was bigger than my house.

content.detailedDescription:
In august of 2003 my 2 brothers and me had to look after my uncles house while they were away on holiday for a week. they live in a small village called culverthorpe a few miles outside of sleaford. after a few days of looking after the house, one evening we were outside and the sky was perfectly clear and the sun had just gone down when we noticed 2 white objects over the fields coming towards us. we didn't know what the objects were. one object was big and round while the other was smaller and almost completely round but seemed to have a sharp edge to it and this object was moving faster than the bigger one but they both were moving in the same direction over the fields in front of us. the objects didn't make any sound and moved too fast to be balloons and they basically moved across the sky until we couldn't see them anymore. we were really excited from seeing these objects, and because we still had a day left looking after my uncles house we decided to borrow my dads digital camera just incase we saw anything else. on the last night we were outside in the garden smoking, the stars were out and it was nice and clear. my brothers were taking pictures with the camera and getting orbs which just seemed to turn up in the pictures, we couldn't see them and my view about these orbs is that most of them are just dust/moisture. when my brothers were taking pictures they were using the flash on the camera. after a while of being outside we noticed something flashing, coming towards us, moving parrellel/horizontal to the ground, over the trees at the bottom of my uncles paddock which is at the bottom of his garden. as the object came closer we could see that it would flash a white light which covered the entire object, then the light on it would decrease until it would go out, then it would increase in brightness and then flash and continue increasing, flashing, decreasing in brightness and the light going out. this object wasn't making any sound and my brother billy who had the camera took a picture of it. about the same time he took the picture we noticed another identical object coming from the same direction. as this second object was nearly above us we could see there was a smaller object, not perfectly round, which was travelling along with it. this smaller object wasn't flashing, it remained at the same brightness. billy took more pictures of these 2 objects together but because the objects were moving so slowly billy was actually taking pictures and checking how the pictures were turning out and seeing that they were blurry he was deleting any blurry ones and would try and get better pictures. after he got a clear picture, which is when the 2 objects were right above us, we watched them travel over the house and out of sight. later on that night we went back outside after we had gone inside for a while and there was an intense fog and we couldn't see the stars anymore. i think because of the moisture in the air my brothers were getting the orb pictures.
attached to this e-mail are the pictures of the objects we saw. number 63 is the first object we saw and was taken just as the light on the object had gone out but you can just about see the object in the top centre of the picture. picture 64 was taken as the second object we saw was overhead and had flashed, you can see the white light around the object. near the lower left of the picture is the smaller white object. because of the settings on the digital camera at the time we saw the objects, the pictures appear quite dark so its best to use autobalance when looking at them, i also brighten them up a bit as well to see the objects better.
these objects aren't orbs which you don't see and appear in photos, we saw the flashing objects which are in the pictures. at the time of the sighting i didn't know what the objects were so i felt curious more than anything and basically stood there while they came over us. after the sighting and the more i think about it i have no idea what the objects are we saw so more than anything i would just like to know if there is a simple explanation for the objects. i don't want to get too excited over something that could be really normal but we have no idea what the objects we saw could be.
please could you e-mail me and tell me if you have ever seen pictures of similar objects before or have you any idea what these objects could be?
content.summary: Saw 2 flashing round objects and 1 smaller round object travelling low and slowly and not making any sound.

content.detailedDescription: I was headed to work at 5:55 am and as i approached the corner of rt. 413 and 202 to make a right, i noticed a car that was headed south in my path driving very slowly and turn right to a stop at the corner of rt. 202 and 413.  the driver had the window turned down and had his head sticking out the window, looking up.  i followed his line of sight and discovered a craft about 3 to 4 inches in size hovering about 45 to 60 degrees above the treetops shaped like a crescent, but wider.  it was changing colors from pink, green, blue and yellow from end to end and appeared to be "steaming" as if hot on this very cold morning. with the traffic behind me, i proceeded to complete a right turn and headed away from the craft, and minutes later noted that it was to my left above the trees as i headed south on rt. 202 about 3 miles to doylestown.  i followed the road into state street and as i was driving noticed that the craft was now smaller about an inch in size and is now hovering between the buldings with a clear view of state street.  i parked my vehicle as i always did next to the curb outside of the bagel barrel, stopped the car and ran in to get pat murphy, the owner, craig, and another assistant at the shop to look at the sighting.  all three gentlement concurred with me that it was not a plane, helicopter or star.  we determined the position of the space station and this object was much brighter and larger by 3 times the size of the station.  pat indicated that it was definitely hovering and stated that it was changing colors  as he was watching it.  we ran in and out of the store to get coffee, (they were baking bagels) and ran out again two or three times to see where the object was.  the men summoned two more men who were frequent patrons at the store and they watched the sighting together at the curb.  i made the call on my cell to the state director, mr. ventre, who asked me to file this report.  i drove away from the shop at about 6:35 am to get to work on time.  i noted that the object at that time seemed to have disappeared since the sky was now brightening.  pat noted that there was another object further away near the first object.
content.summary: None

content.detailedDescription:
I got an olympus e-510 for a gift and started to take pictures of everything, and then forgot that i had taken some weird pictures.  i just went through the memory card and found several things.  any explanations are appreciated, because i'm not knowledgeable about the ufo thing, but i can't explain these either.  the first pictures were taken at 9:52 - 9:54 on february 20, 2008.  i was on my way to bed and saw lights and snapped through the upstairs bedroom window.  these are yellow/gold shape changing things.

then i went downstairs and onto my deck and took the next three pictures - one of a disc (moon?) against a lighter sky, and then two pictures of curtains or garments or lace, except that i cannot find anything in my house that would have gotten in the way of the pictures.  are these tracks of something?  this happened the same night about 5 minutes after the above pictures were taken.  

june 28, 2008, i took 2 pictures of something, in the evening i believe, which must be the moon with light arcing over it.

finally, i am sending three pictures of v-shaped contrails which i am sure are normal, but i can't figure out if the planes started at the same spot or ended at the same spot!  these are morning pictures, taken from my deck.
content.shape: Boomerang,  Bullet,  Missile,  Chevron,  Disc,  Fireball,  Sphere,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: Yellow shape-changer, disc in weird blue sky disc, then curtains! then other things

content.detailedDescription:
this is the second day of ufo sightings in this same area.  i filed a report with mufon for the first series of sightings.  my fiance, [cms/tg/pid] & i were travelling the same route that we do everyday, the route that we had the first series of ufo encounters, when we sighted two ufo's at the same intersection.  someone in a ufo meeting group that i belong to researched our sightings and said these objects couldn't be venus or jupiter.  the objects appeared to be spherical and glowing very brightly.  one of the objects moved in a circular motion, the other moved very slowly.  we will be travelling this same route almost every night and report to mufon any other ufo sightings we may encounter.
   sincerely,

[cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: My fiance and i sighted two ufo's.

content.detailedDescription: Watched intermitent flashes for approx. 4 min. it did not move during this time.  i turned, went into the house, called for my girlfriend to see it.  she then viewed the stationary flashes with me for about 2 min. the flashes were erratic and about 5 to 20 seconds apart.  then suddenly we jumped at what i assume was a bright shooting star above our heads. when we looked back to the spot in the sky where the flashing was comming from, we were shocked to see the flashing had moved approx. 3 inches across the sky toward where the shooting star had just lit up.. that moment went by very quickly. we observed the flashing for another min or so then it just didnt flash anymore. whatever it was, was too far away to see any shape, but i tell you it was stationary in the sky and reacted to the bright shooting star. i swear this all to be true. -nate  btw:we live directly under a very busy skyway along the west coast south of portland so some pilot out there had to see this i would imagine.
content.summary: Stationary with intermitent flashes of white light.

content.detailedDescription: Was standing on my deck when i observed 6 white lights that did not change color in a circular pattern, equidistant from each other moving in a counterclockwise direction, then a clockwise direction very slowly.  i would say that the altitude was less than 2000 feet.  the pattern then changed to a v formation moving nw very slowly.  i went around to the front of my house to follow the lights, and my neighbors' parents were in the driveway unpacking their car.  i asked the gentleman if he observed the lights also.  he confirmed them, and was as puzzled as i to what it could be.  there was no sound associated with them.  they continued nw in movement and we lost sight of them because of trees.
content.summary: Rotating counter-clockwise,then clockwise circular formation 6 white lights, then formed lopsided v, moving slowly at estimated less than 2000 ft.

content.detailedDescription: Driving south on craycroft at 22nd street looked up and saw what my uncle and i thought were balloons. upon inspecting them for a few minutes decided that they were not balloons. stopped at a shell station to get out of truck and both my uncle patrick and i observed a cluster of three "balloons" and one "balloon" off to one side about 50feet. these things were not going with the flow of the wind. other people observed us looking at these objects and started to look as well. we then saw the solitary "balloon" join up with the others to become one. after joining together they had what i would call a new shape, and a white light appeared on the right side of the cluster then a reddish laser type light on the left side. as soon as that happened to whole object blinked out and was gone. during this event my friend frank; who had reported a light on friday the 28th of november, moving quickly across the sky, lives to the west of this event by maybe a mile, i called him to get on his roof and see if he could see it as well. he could not see it. something seems to be getting started in tucson. we will be on our roofs for the next couple of days to see if this is a trend, and we'll keep you posted.
content.summary: Thought at first it was black or dark colored balloons, joined up then blinked out.

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my boat duck hunting in the venice marshland about 3 miles from the main venice island around january 1982 (approximately at +45��� 24' 24.62", +12��� 14' 59.43") it was around 4 am local time and i was waiting for some dawn light to start shooting. there was a thick fog with less than 10 feet visibility and it was freezing cold. i was just about to pour a cup of coffee when i started noticing that the fog around me was quickly beginning to disappear and i begun to feels this light warm air coming down on me, like a breeze, which felt like being under a heat pump while its on. i could also smell something, which i have never smelled before or again, it was a very unusual harsh chemical smell. i then looked up and i saw this cigar shaped object, about 80 feet above me. i initially thought that it might be a small aircraft but i quickly realized that it could not have been one as it wasn't moving at all or making any noise. at this point i was pretty scared to the point where i reached for my rifle and proceeded to load it as i feared for my safety. the object was dark in colour and it has these fluorescent lights underneath it, which looked pink. the object was about 100ft long and it was still for the entire time it was above me. i can't really be sure on how long this lasted but my take is that it was between 1 to 2 minutes. when it finally left, it first moved slowly, then increased speed dramatically reaching an altitude of about 650 ft, finally disappeared from my sight. at this point, i couldn't feel the warm air or the smell anymore and the fog quickly returned. the next day i contacted the local airport and asked if there was any traffic in that area at that time and i was told that there was nothing has the weather conditions and visibility where poor for any flight and that all flights where canceled or delayed. about a week later, a newspaper in a town about 150 miles from venice published a photograph of the same object. not sure what that thing was but i will never forget what i saw - i did not believe in "ufos" before that night.
content.summary: Cigar shaped ufo close encounter near venice, italy 1982.

content.detailedDescription: I live in a western suburb of chicago. i was driving east when i noticed 4 bright lights to the north east approximately where o'hare airport is. i thought the lights were exceptionally bright for an airplane. they were in a straight line. what drew my attention was the spacing of the lights. i studied to be an air traffic controller years ago and know something about the rules for spacing between commercial flights. i didn't think it strange even then assuming that the spacing appeared that way due ,possibly, to the angle of the approaching planes. they seemed very high for planes approaching the airport. i kept trying to convince myself that it was just a group of planes coming in to the airport but there was no flashing strobe. they seemed brighter than even the planes that were closer. there are always a lot of planes coming and going at the airport. i could easily tell them apart from the rest of the traffic in the sky. i kept watching and stopped at a stoplight. i watched to see if they were moving. they appeared to stay stationary. they never moved as i watched them while sitting at the light. i kept very still and tried to use the outsid edge of the mirror of my car to determine any movement at all. they didn't move. i don't think they were helicopters with so much traffic over o'hare. i don't know for sure what i saw but it was not like anything i've seen before. i've lived in the area most of my life and i am use to seeing planes come and go in their routes to and from the airport. someone else had to see this if i did. there had to be pilots that saw it tonight. i don't know what to think. i know what i saw though.
content.summary: Lights near o'hare airport different than planes.
